whoami

I'm Salman, a developer who spends too much time debugging and not enough time sleeping. These are my unfiltered thoughts on code, tech, and the digital world.

git config --global user.name Salman Qureshi

Fork This Blog

OpLog is open source and developed by Salman Qureshi. You can clone it and create your own blog from your federated instance (Mastodon, Pleroma, or Akkoma).

git clone https://github.com/hotheadhacker/akkoma-blog.git cd akkoma-blog npm install npm run start
View on GitHub

Federated Content

OpLog is powered by the ActivityPub protocol, the same technology behind the Fediverse. Posts are fetched directly from my Akkoma instance.

Learn about ActivityPub
